data.name: Rabobank Farm Management Deposit (Variable rate)
data.description: Available to primary producers, the Rabobank Farm Management Deposits (FMD) can help you set aside pre-tax income in the good years to help manage your business in the lower income years.

features.additionalInfo: All deposits help support Australia’s progressive and dynamic agricultural sector by funding rural loans.
Australian Government Guarantee. The Australian Government Guarantee protects the first $250,000 of all deposits held, per account holder, with Rabobank.

The key benefit of these investments is that they are fully tax deductible in the year of deposit and only taxable in the year of withdrawal (deposits must usually be held for a minimum of 12 months to qualify for these tax benefits). This allows primary producers to reduce their taxable income and to help manage cashflow.

Rabobank Farm Management Deposit interest rates earn you daily returns to maximise your investment growth. All interest payments and withdrawals from Rabobank Farm Management Deposits are direct credited to your nominated bank account, and no account service fees apply (Government taxes may apply).
Interest calculated on the daily closing principal balance and paid quarterly in arrears.
Interest payments and withdrawals directly credited to your nominated bank account.
Variable interest rates to earn you daily returns.
A tiered interest rate structure to give you maximum return on your money.
Access to funds when you need them.
Available to primary producers with a taxable non-primary production income of no more than $100,000 in the year of deposit.
Any amount from $1,000 to $800,000 can be invested per farmer.
Total Farm Management Deposit deductions in any year cannot exceed your taxable primary production income for that year.
Companies, trusts and partnerships are not eligible to hold Farm Management Deposits – but they are available to certain beneficiaries of trusts and individual partners of a partnership.
Minimum withdrawals of $1,000 can be made, but this does not apply when closing the account.

constraints.additionalInfo: The total balance of all your Farm Management Deposit accounts can't be more than $800,000.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Rabobank rural banking products are designed for farm businesses.

You must be an individual Primary Producer (with taxable non-primary production income of $100,000 or less or other amount as amended by legislation from time to time) at the time of making a Farm Management Deposit.
